title: 07/19/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 07/19/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Florio
description:
Mike Florio talks to Dan about The Dallas Cowboys and the Pittsburgh Steelers. Mike says that the Cowboys are the most intriguing to him although he cannot understand why Big Ben Roethlisberger came back nor why the Steelers wanted him back.

Mike Florio talks to Dan about The Dallas Cowboys and the Pittsburgh Steelers. Mike says that the Cowboys are the most intriguing to him although he cannot understand why Big Ben Roethlisberger came back nor why the Steelers wanted him back.
